nodes.text: A twelve-year-old Duros girl named Alysssa Maggrit ran a numbers racket for her uncle in the city of Tolea Biqua above the planet Genarius at the beginning of the Clone Wars. In a failed effort to publicly reveal on the HoloNet the true name of the slicer alyssaroxu, inept fellow slicer wampa1 mistakenly identified her as Alysssa Maggrit, thus inadvertently blowing Maggrit's cover. Alyssaroxu speculated that Maggrit's uncle would enact vengeance on wampa1 for doing so.
